titles.title: Authorizing the Clerk to inform the President of the election of the Clerk.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/15/2007--Passed House without amendment. Instructs the Clerk to inform the President of the United States that the House of Representatives has elected that Lorraine C. Miller, a citizen of Texas, Clerk of the House of Representatives.
